heading.title: Cybersecurity Engineer
heading.job: Cybersecurity Consultant, Full-stack Developer, and Embedded Programming
heading.inShort: I am Zhou Killian, a cybersecurity consultant at CGI Business Consulting.
descriptions: I am Zhou Killian, a cybersecurity consultant at CGI Business Consulting, with over 10 years of experience, starting as a self-taught developer. My career has been solidified by studies at EFREI Paris, where I gained both technical and strategic cybersecurity skills. Today, I specialize in risk analysis and penetration testing, having conducted over 40 analyses using the EBIOS methods in various IT environments, including generative artificial intelligence.

Additionally, my roles have allowed me to work on the analysis of non-standard applications and the organization of crisis exercises to test responses to cyberattacks. My career has also led me to a full-stack developer role at Brain Security, where I led the overhaul of a gamification application for cybersecurity awareness. I enjoy integrating organizational knowledge and practical skills to navigate the ever-evolving world of digital security.
Finally, from a more personal perspective, my previous role as president of the ICE association and my regular practice of swimming add an associative and sports dimension to my profile.
I invite you to explore my portfolio to discover my skills, projects, and perspectives in the field of cybersecurity and technology.
